Name: Malcolm Dawson
Job/Team Function: The chief executive of Land Registry, reporting to the Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills. Responsible for the strategic direction and management of the Agency's operations, and answerable to Parliament for the proper financial management of Land Registry.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Rowland Coombs
Job/Team Function: Accountable and responsible for all aspects of the Information Systems (IS) Directorate. Responsible for providing information systems to Land Registry's staff and customers, and for providing leadership to the IS community. This includes the direction of Land Registry’s IS policies, practices and resources including its personnel, external contracts, enterprise architecture, information assets and overall responsibility for information security.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Jonathan Cocking
Job/Team Function: Responsible for the leadership of the HR and corporate facilities and estates functions, ensuring efficient and effective day-to-day services that have the capacity and capability to support business change.  Senior Responsible Owner responsible for the delivery of Land Registry's Performance and Innovation (P&I) project.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Alasdair Lewis
Job/Team Function: Principal legal adviser responsible for the provision of legal services within Land Registry, including the management and development of the Agency's team of lawyers, and responsible for the legal framework for land registration and for the integrity of the register. Overall responsibility for Land Registry’s Project and Programme Centre.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: John Peaden
Job/Team Function: Responsible for the delivery of operational Key Performance Indicators and for key decisions regarding operational strategy, performance and for work practices and procedures in 14 local offices and the central operations group.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Heather Foster
Job/Team Function: Responsible for strategic financial, procurement, financial management and business planning. Accountable and responsible for all aspects of the Finance Directorate which includes: Business Planning, Finance, Corporate Procurement,, Risk Management and Internal Audit.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: Edwin Davies
Job/Team Function: Responsible for leading the Commercial and Customer Directorate in the development and implementation of customer experience and contact strategies, marketing, sales, product and service development, customer services, stakeholder engagement and International unit.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Responsible for the provision of legal advice to Land Registry on non-registration matters including compliance with central guidance and public rights legislation on competition issues, intellectual property rights, data protection, freedom of information and human rights.
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Land Registrars lead and manage a team of lawyers to deliver decisions on and facilitate the completion of high value, complex and contentious casework
Parent Department: Department for Business Innovation and Skills
